title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 16 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 16 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then Job answered and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯回答说，

lineList.en: I have heard many such things: miserable comforters are ye all.
lineList.cn: 这样的话我听了许多。你们安慰人，反叫人愁烦。

lineList.en: Shall vain words have an end? or what emboldeneth thee that thou answerest?
lineList.cn: 虚空的言语有穷尽吗。有什么话惹动你回答呢。

lineList.en: I also could speak as ye do: if your soul were in my soul's stead, I could heap up words against you, and shake mine head at you.
lineList.cn: 我也能说你们那样的话。你们若处在我的境遇，我也会联络言语攻击你们，又能向你们摇头。

lineList.en: But I would strengthen you with my mouth, and the moving of my lips should asswage your grief.
lineList.cn: 但我必用口坚固你们，用嘴消解你们的忧愁。

lineList.en: Though I speak, my grief is not asswaged: and though I forbear, what am I eased?
lineList.cn: 我虽说话，忧愁仍不得消解。我虽停住不说，忧愁就离开我吗。

lineList.en: But now he hath made me weary: thou hast made desolate all my company.
lineList.cn: 但现在神使我困倦，使亲友远离我。

lineList.en: And thou hast filled me with wrinkles, which is a witness against me: and my leanness rising up in me beareth witness to my face.
lineList.cn: 又抓住我，作见证攻击我。我身体的枯瘦，也当面见证我的不是。

lineList.en: He teareth me in his wrath, who hateth me: he gnasheth upon me with his teeth; mine enemy sharpeneth his eyes upon me.
lineList.cn: 主发怒撕裂我，逼迫我，向我切齿。我的敌人怒目看我。

lineList.en: They have gaped upon me with their mouth; they have smitten me upon the cheek reproachfully; they have gathered themselves together against me.
lineList.cn: 他们向我开口，打我的脸羞辱我，聚会攻击我。

lineList.en: God hath delivered me to the ungodly, and turned me over into the hands of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 神把我交给不敬虔的人，把我扔到恶人的手中。

lineList.en: I was at ease, but he hath broken me asunder: he hath also taken me by my neck, and shaken me to pieces, and set me up for his mark.
lineList.cn: 我素来安逸，他折断我，掐住我的颈项，把我摔碎。又立我为他的箭靶子。

lineList.en: His archers compass me round about, he cleaveth my reins asunder, and doth not spare; he poureth out my gall upon the ground.
lineList.cn: 他的弓箭手四面围绕我。他破裂我的肺腑，并不留情，把我的胆倾倒在地上，

lineList.en: He breaketh me with breach upon breach, he runneth upon me like a giant.
lineList.cn: 将我破裂又破裂，如同勇士向我直闯。

lineList.en: I have sewed sackcloth upon my skin, and defiled my horn in the dust.
lineList.cn: 我缝麻布在我皮肤上，把我的角放在尘土中。

lineList.en: My face is foul with weeping, and on my eyelids is the shadow of death;
lineList.cn: 我的脸因哭泣发紫，在我的眼皮上有死荫。

lineList.en: Not for any injustice in mine hands: also my prayer is pure.
lineList.cn: 我的手中却无强暴。我的祈祷也是清洁。

lineList.en: O earth, cover not thou my blood, and let my cry have no place.
lineList.cn: 地阿，不要遮盖我的血。不要阻挡我的哀求。

lineList.en: Also now, behold, my witness is in heaven, and my record is on high.
lineList.cn: 现今，在天有我的见证，在上有我的中保。

lineList.en: My friends scorn me: but mine eye poureth out tears unto God.
lineList.cn: 我的朋友讥诮我，我却向神眼泪汪汪。

lineList.en: O that one might plead for a man with God, as a man pleadeth for his neighbour!
lineList.cn: 愿人得与神辩白，如同人与朋友辩白一样。

lineList.en: When a few years are come, then I shall go the way whence I shall not return.
lineList.cn: 因为再过几年，我必走那往而不返之路。
